description: Primes such that in p^2 the parity of digits alternates.
mathematica: id[n_]:=IntegerDigits[n]; t={}; Do[p=Prime[n]; If[Length[id[p]]==1,AppendTo[t,p], If[Union[Abs[Differences[Boole/@EvenQ[id[p^2]]]]]=={1}, AppendTo[t,p]]], {n,1300}]; t (* _Jayanta Basu_, May 07 2013 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
